completion.item: <[!CDATA[Adds a listener to a specified domNode and store the added event in the event manager.Parameters: HTMLElement domNode - the node where the event is added toDOMString type - the event typeObject|Function listener - the desired action handlerReturns: generated event-object for this listener ]]>

<[!CDATA[Removes a specified eventParameters:
Event event - object which is returned by addListener()
				]]>
